definition: to search/to demand/to ask/to exact/large rope/isolated
surname Suo/abbr. for 索馬里|索马里[Suo3 ma3 li3], Somalia

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters
human flesh search engine/a large-scale collective effort to find details about a person or event (Internet slang)
pinyin: ren2 rou4 sou1 suo3 yin3 qing2

sentences.english: More dramatic is the introduction of goal-driven search engine marketing campaigns.
sentences.chinese: 更戏剧性的是，目标驱动的搜索引擎营销活动的介绍。

sentences.english: It also lets you search and compare results from two search engines side by side.
sentences.chinese: 它还提供从两个搜索引擎搜索和并列比较结果。

sentences.english: For search engines, mainly Baidu and GG, respectively, please answer.
sentences.chinese: 针对搜索引擎，主要是百度和GG，请分别解答。

sentences.english: Sites owned by search engine optimizers are not accepted.
sentences.chinese: 通过搜索引擎优化国有土地没有被接受。

sentences.english: In the beginning, the search engine is only an accessorial tool in some famous portal sites.
sentences.chinese: 起初，搜索引擎只是一些著名门户网站的辅助工具。

sentences.english: You can even customize your experience with different searches.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自定义使用不同搜索引擎。

sentences.english: Therefore, my subject will finish the search engine based on industry.
sentences.chinese: 果彼课题完败了基于行业的个性化搜索引擎。

sentences.english: Try Indeed.com, a meta-search engine for job hunters.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个为找工作的人提供的元搜索引擎。

sentences.english: This can result in the search engine's index not accurately reflecting content of the web.
sentences.chinese: 这可能导致搜索引擎索引不正确反映网页内容。

sentences.english: Recall that the search engine crawls a large set of pages in a small timeframe.
sentences.chinese: 回想到搜索引擎在短时间内抓取大量的页面。

sentences.english: IR systems or search engines do not publish their working schemes.
sentences.chinese: 信息提取系统或者搜索引擎没有公开他们的工作方案。

sentences.english: I found, integrating many of the world search engine, a one-stop search site.
sentences.chinese: 给我搜，整合全球众多搜索引擎的一站式搜索网站。

sentences.english: If the search engine doesn't work, try a white page directory.
sentences.chinese: 如果搜索引擎不起作用，可以直接白页查询。

sentences.english: What do you use and in what circumstances do you use it?
sentences.chinese: 你使用什么样的搜索引擎，什么情况下会使用？

sentences.english: All pages added are scanned by search engines.
sentences.chinese: 所有添加的网页都会被搜索引擎仔细检查。

sentences.english: What blog search engine should you use?
sentences.chinese: 你应该使用什么样的搜索引擎呢？

definition: Baidu, Internet portal and search engine, www.baidu.com, listed as BIDU on NASDAQ since 1999
Google, Internet company and search engine

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
